text: Karni Mata ( or Karniji;) (Karni Mata is also referred to as Nari Bai) (circa 2 October 1387 - circa 23 March 1538,) was a female Hindu warrior sage born in the Charan caste. Also known as Shri Karniji Maharaj, she is worshiped as the incarnation of the warrior goddess Durga by her followers. She is an official deity of the royal families of Jodhpur and Bikaner. ==References== ==Other websites== * Explanation of Karni (Karniji) Category:Hindu gods and goddesses
title: Karni Mata
